Plot: Humorist Lise Dion, journalist Therese Parisien and comedian Natalie Lecompte, all three of them recall their adoption story and how grateful they are towards their adoptive parents who allowed them to become who they are.
Title: Bonheur d'Adoption
Actors: Stephane Fallu, Bianca Longpré, François Massicotte, Stevens Simeon
